title: Secretarybird
description: This is a 3D model and animations of a Secretarybird.
longDescription:
Preview:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3hSpbUf5l60

A demonstration is ready with an operable character.

Proper landing is done by two bone IK.

In order to express the bending of the flight feathers, two bones were used per flight feathers and tail feathers.

Hence the number of bones is high(bones count:239).

Please be careful if your environment is limited to a certain number of bones.

Versions 5.1 and above include Groom.

If you use it in VR, please delete Groom.


How to use BP_SecretarybirdRandomBehavior

1. Place as many BP_LandingPoints as you like in the scene.

2. Place as many BP_SecretarybirdRandomBehavior as you like in the scene.

Then BP_SecretarybirdRandomBehavior repeats the action of walking randomly and the action of flying while avoiding obstacles to the landing point.

BP_SecretarybirdRandomBehavior will fly off if the player approaches a certain distance.


BP_SecretarybirdThirdPersonCharacter operation method:

wasd or arrow:walk

f:soar

wasd:up speed and turn speed change

arrow:forward speed and turn speed change
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Realistic flapping and folding wing animations.
  •  Foot IK.
  •  Operable character.
  • Character flying towards destination.

Scaled to Epic skeleton: No

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

Animated: Yes

Number of characters:1

Mesh_SecretarybirdHighPoly:60901

Mesh_SecretarybirdHighPolyNoHeadFeather:39790

Mesh_SecretarybirdMiddlePoly:15972

Mesh_SecretarybirdMiddlePolyNoHeadFeathers:10754

Mesh_SecretarybirdLowPoly:3402

Mesh_SecretarybirdLowPolyNoHeadFeathers:3012

Feather

Base color:2048x2048

Number of Animations:60

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place):Both (60animations +26Root motion variations of walk and run.)

Supported Development Platforms: Windows macOS

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows macOS
